title: Perkulat0r - Transcension (2014)
description:
Artist: Perkulat0r

Title: Transcension

Label/Cat#: Gravitas Recordings

Release date: 2014-03-25

Format: Flac + MP3 320 Kbps

Size: 352 mb

Genre: Electronic

Style: Glitch, Glitch Hop

Tracklist

1. Retroflux (04:26)

2. Mellifluent (04:48)

3. Crushmode ft. WET PAiNT (04:39)

4. Transcend (05:00)

5. Ascension (05:30)

6. Orbital (05:17)

7. Mellifluent (CloZee Remix) (04:55)

8. Transcend (Dubvirus Remix) (04:41)


Seductive and whimsical, Perkulat0r's debut release "Transcension", released on Gravitas Recordings, is quite a special conception. As the winner of last year's Minnesota remix contest, this young producer has set the bar high with every deep, textured song he's devised. A tactile atmosphere is created within each track, showcasing an apparent keen ear for synthesis and firm grasp on melody. CloZee and Dubvirus both provide extraordinary remix renditions, each adding their own signature sounds to the bouncy, animated originals.
